revised_title: Tschirnhausen Transformation and Invariants of Two Quantics
tldr: The author, Arthur Cayley, discusses Tschirnhausen transformations and invariants of two quantics. He explains how to determine the value of T to make the second term in a given equation vanish, and demonstrates the transformation for the general case. Cayley also considers the problem of reducing the general quintic equation to Mr. Jerrard's form.
